content: watch the birdie this is a simple bird-themed jumper for approximate ages 6 months to 6 years a little bird told me has a band of birds on a different coloured background just above the rib i used debbie bliss rialto dk a soft yarn in a good range of colours �1 to fit approximate ages 6 months finished chest size 19 48 cms length from back of neck 11 5 29 cms sleeve seam 8 20 cms 1- 2 years finished chest size 21 53 cms length from back of neck 13 33 cms sleeve seam 9 23 cms 3-4 years finished chest size 23 5 59 5 cms length from back of neck 15 38 cms sleeve seam 10 25 cms 5-6 years finished chest size 25 63 5 cms length from back of neck 16 40 5 cms sleeve seam 11 5 29 cms materials 3 4 5 6 x 50g in pink or chosen main colour 1 x 50g in white or a contrast background for all sizes 1 x 50g in purple or chosen colour for birds for all sizes 3 buttons 12-15 cms in diameter pair of single-pointed needles 3 25mm size 10 usa 3 pair of single-pointed needles 4 00 mm size 8 usa 6 wool needle gauge 22 stitches / 30 row = 4 inches 10cm measured over stocking stitch on size 4 00 mm needles if square measures more than required width/length use smaller needles if less use larger needles notes the amounts of yarn are based on sizes given here if you lengthen the garment or use a substitute yarn you may need more instructions for the larger sizes are given in brackets �2 to get the best results on the stranded colour work it s best to use the same brand of yarn to work the increases - you can either knit first into the front and then into the back of the next stitch or you can pick up the loop between two stitches and knit into the back of it abbreviations m main colour a background colour b colour chosen for birds k knit p purl b indicates that you work into the back of the loop st / sts stitch / stitches tbl through back of loop k2 decrease knit 2 stitches together p2 decrease purl 2 stitches together s1 slip one stitch across without working into it psso pass slipped stitch over the last one you worked this decreases one stitch back *using smaller needles cast on 53 57 65 69 stitches row 1 right side p1 k1tbl p1 repeat to end row 2 k1 p1tbl k1 repeat to end these 2 row will now be referred to as twisted rib repeat these 2 row of twisted rib 4 5 5 6 times more change to larger needles the jumper is knitted in stocking stitch right side row knit reverse side purl from this point knit 2 row in main colour border chart 1 work
